Possession.name: A Rat
Possession.description: What are you to do with this thing?

Possession.name: Jar of Blue Liquid
Possession.description: The smell suggests that drinking this would be unwise.

Possession.name: Memory of Violence
Possession.description: You recall wild eyes and trembling hands.

Possession.name: Reputation: The Rat Kingdom
Possession.description: Tenacious little things rats are. A little cheese can go a long way with them though.

Possession.name: Stinky Cheese
Possession.description: Holding this cheese makes you smell awful, but the rats seem to love it.

Possession.name: Saber
Possession.description: Time has not been kind to this blade.
